remark.p: Deputy Regional Director for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Operations, Foreign Operations Administration, until May 1, 1955; Regional Director, May 1, 1955–October 8, 1956 (International Cooperation Administration after July 1, 1955); Regional Director for Near Eastern and South Asian Operations, October 8, 1956–August 15, 1957

Deputy Regional Director for Near Eastern, South Asian, and African Operations, Foreign Operations Administration, until May 1, 1955; Regional Director, International Cooperation Administration, May 1, 1955–October 8, 1956; Regional Director for Near Eastern and South Asian Operations, October 8, 1956–August 15, 1957; thereafter Director of the United States Operations Mission in Morocco
Regional Director for Near East, South Asia, and African Operations, International Cooperation Agency, from May 1955
